pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Easily Canvas in 'shiny' and 'RMarkdown' Documents // Allows the user to implement easily canvas elements within a 'shiny' app or an 'RMarkdown' document. The user can create shapes, images and text elements within the canvas which can also be used as a drawing tool for taking notes. The package relies on the 'fabricjs' 'JavaScript' library. See http://fabricjs.com/.
